russian: что, чтобы, как, a, ecли бы
english: that, to, so, so that, in order to
yes, (used when starting a question, expressing wishes, commands)
japanese-: はい、(疑問文の最初に置く)

english: is, third person singular of 'to be'
and, also, too, as well, even, so
in, at, to, into, on, during
japanese-: に、で、の中に、の内部に、において

english: to, on, onto, at, in, by, for, at
for, behind, by, instead, about, during, after, as
japanese-: ために、後ろに、間に、代わりに、で

english: are, second person singular of 'to be'
me, myself (genitive or accusative of I)
japanese-: 私を (主格形 対格形)
あなたを、君を、お前を (主格形 対格形)
